page.title: 03Sarah's Dad's Day
page.content:
My Dad gets up at 7.00 a.m. and then he has his breakfast. At 7.30 a.m. he wakes me and my brother Karl. Then he makes a drink of coffee for me and Karl. At 8.00 a.m. Karl goes to school and Dad goes to work. He works at a shoe factory in Melbourne. He packs shoes in boxes.At 5.00 p.m. all of the other people go home but my Dad stays to sweep up.
At 6.00 p.m. he comes home and has his tea.About 7.30 p.m. he picks the strawberries then he watches the T.V. About 12.00 a.m. he has a wash and goes to bed.
